name: 胡憲倫
objective:
Global environmental and sustainability problems, such as pollution, climate change, poverty etc. are so huge and complicated, hence for solving those problems one must analyze and see things from a boarder and systems perspective, so that one will not fix one problem but create another problem to somewhere else or sometime in the future. In this course, students will be taught how to think in a holistic way when dealing with global environmental and sustainability problems and solve them from systems perspective. Students also will also be taught the systems dynamic modeling technique, and SD software, Stalla, will be used for students to practice how to solve problem dynamically. Actually, similar technique will also be applied to individuals for helping their personal life.
全球環境及永續發展問題的解決，必須從宏觀的視野分析及規劃，並擬定能適合符合當地的策略及做法，方能竟其功。本課程著重在從系統的角度，辨別及解決環境問題。學生將會學到了解何謂系統思考、環境系統運作的基本原理、環境系統化管理的工具，以及環境系統動態模擬軟體Stella，並學習如何實際模擬各種環境問題。
